title: STAT+: What’s in Congress’ sweeping health care deal: PBM reform, telehealth, science funding
description: The health department would get $116.8 billion in funding, a modest increase over 2025 but $33 billion more than Trump requested.
content: The health department would get $116.8 billion in funding, a modest increase over 2025 but $33 billion more than Trump requested.
